20110111010047.000|20110111010051.000|CC1|THEM IN GOOD CONDITION.

20110111010052.000|20110111010054.000|CC1|ONE IN CRITICAL CONDITION

20110111010054.000|20110111010057.000|CC1|MICHELLE: WHAT DO ANALYSTS THINK

20110111010058.000|20110111010059.000|CC1|POSSIBLE DEFENSE IN THIS        
20110111010059.000|20110111010100.000|CC1|SHOOTING.                       
20110111010100.000|20110111010100.000|CC1|>> Reporter: WE TALKED TO A     
20110111010100.000|20110111010102.000|CC1|LEADING DEFENSE ATTORNEY HERE IN
20110111010102.000|20110111010102.000|CC1|TUCSON.                         
20110111010102.000|20110111010104.000|CC1|HE SAID THAT INSANITY WILL      
20110111010104.000|20110111010105.000|CC1|LIKELY BE THE DEFENSE.          
20110111010105.000|20110111010106.000|CC1|THEY ARE NOT CLEAR WHETHER HE   
20110111010106.000|20110111010107.000|CC1|WILL DO THAT OR NOT.

20110111010109.000|20110111010110.000|CC1|BE THE WAY TO GO, THAT THE

20110111010111.000|20110111010113.000|CC1|PIECE THERE, THE WORDS, MY

20110111010116.000|20110111010118.000|CC1|WHAT HE WAS DOING AND HE WAS NOT
20110111010118.000|20110111010119.000|CC1|IN FACT INSANE.                 
20110111010119.000|20110111010120.000|CC1|THE ATTORNEY SAID THAT EVEN IF

20110111010122.000|20110111010124.000|CC1|DOESN'T MEAN THAT HE'S GOING TO

20110111010140.000|20110111010140.000|CC1|REPORT.

20110111010143.000|20110111010143.000|CC1|NINE-YEAR-OLD CHRISTINA TAYLOR  
20110111010143.000|20110111010145.000|CC1|GREEN THE DAUGHTER OF A SCOTT   
20110111010145.000|20110111010146.000|CC1|FOR THE L.A. DODGERS.           
20110111010146.000|20110111010149.000|CC1|SHE HAD JUST BEEN ELECTED TO THE
20110111010149.000|20110111010151.000|CC1|STUDENT COUNCIL, AND THOSE WHO  
20110111010151.000|20110111010154.000|CC1|KNEW HER SAID THE REASON SHE

20110111013745.000|20110111013746.000|CC1|JUST DOWN THE ROAD IS ALSO
